attributes.action: allow anyone over the age of 16 to vote
attributes.additional_details: because those parties are going to be deciding there future. At 16 the majority of them are mature and would like the responsibility to have a say in there future.
attributes.background: The government should allow anyone over the age of 16 vote.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598399
